ai-patthana17.25:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.25:1.1_0: placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness arises dependent on the mind and keeping it connected. Feeling is a cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.25:2.1_0: (Only) a thought are skillful, without placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness arises dependent on the skillful, and with the thought.
ai-patthana17.25:2.1_1: (But) the cause of practitioners, the overestimation of the fifteenth ...
ai-patthana17.25:2.1_2: that’s not the fifteenth day sabbath.
ai-patthana17.25:3.1_0: applied and sustained thought does not arise when it comes to the mind, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
